data.name: Volcanoids
data.detailed_description:
Discord Community (26,317 members)


About the Game

Volcanoids is a base-building open-world survival shooter that replaces the boring old base with a steampunk drill. Alone or with up to 3 other crewmates, explore an ever-changing volcanic island, build out your drill, and fight hostile machines to reveal what's been hiding in the depths of the underground.


EXPLORE AN EVER-CHANGING VOLCANIC ISLAND
Explore a seemingly abandoned island cursed by persistent eruptions. Utilize your drillship's ability to travel underground to survive these eruptions as you discover new parts of the island, gather resources, and uncover secrets.


BATTLE ROBOTS AND DESTROY THEIR MACHINERY
Battle hostile mining robots of all shapes and sizes who roam the island's surface as well as underground. Capture any of their resources and technology that might be useful and destroy the rest.


CRAFT, UPGRADE AND AUTOMATE
The "drillship" is your very own mobile fortress. Customize it from inside out using the building system. Progress through technology tiers to upgrade, expand, automate, and weaponize different parts of the drillship.

COMPLETE QUESTS FOR THE EXPEDITION
Complete different tasks and collect intel for the captain that brought you to the island in exchange for useful tips and information. However, at any point during your journey, you can stop reporting back to him and continue on your own.

data.short_description: A base-building open-world survival shooter that replaces the typical base with a modular drill. Alone or with friends, explore an island plagued by eruptions, upgrade your drill, and battle robots to uncover what's been hiding beneath the surface.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Italian, Polish
*languages with full audio support
data.reviews:
“Volcanoids could be one of the next go-to games within the survival adventure genre”
The Gamer

“Looks pretty darn cool”
PC Gamer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit (Service Pack 1)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 470 / AMD RadeonHD 5850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Future releases may require more hard drive space.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Future releases may require more hard drive space.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 19.04 or equivalent distribution
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 660 / AMD RadeonHD 7850, OpenGL 4.5 or Vulkan driver
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Future releases may require more hard drive space.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 LTS or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070 / AMD Radeon RX 580, Vulkan driver
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Future releases may require more hard drive space.
